snippet.title: Mayhem Masters Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Mayhem Masters is a fast-paced arena blaster where the key to victory is skill and tactical thinking. Collect the best powerups for yourself, and obliterate your opponents with explosions, blocks, or diseases. Choose one of 10 colourful, archetypal characters and master the Mayhem!

You can add the game to your Steam wishlist today:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1219170/Mayhem_Masters

Additional sfx credit to Mike Koenig
